column6: Any combination of records, unions and enumerations (as well as references to those, enabling recursive types).
column7: type identifier (variation : discrete_type) is record case variation is when choice_list1 => fieldname1 : type

column4: Required types and operators can be user defined
enum name { case Foo«(types)» case Bar «(types)» ... }

column2: Structure name Dim name As type ... End Structure
TYPE name type :: name ... END TYPE

column4: abstract class name case class Foo(«parameters») extends name case class Bar(«parameters») extends name ... or abstract class name case object Foo extends name case object Bar extends name ... or combination of case classes and case objects

column5: type name = Foo «of type» | Bar «of type» | ...

column4: datatype name = Foo «of type» | Bar «of type» | ...

column2: level-number name type clauses.   level-number+n name type clauses.   ...
